movie.title: The Snow Queen 2
movie.description_intro: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.
movie.description_full: Snow queen casts a curse on her mirror making people see the worst in themselves.

movies.title: A Little Bit of Heaven
movies.summary: An irreverent young woman who uses her humor to prevent matters from getting serious has a life-changing visit with her doctor.
movies.description_full: An irreverent young woman who uses her humor to prevent matters from getting serious has a life-changing visit with her doctor.
movies.synopsis: An irreverent young woman who uses her humor to prevent matters from getting serious has a life-changing visit with her doctor.

movies.title: Mars Attacks!
movies.summary: It is a normal day for everyone, until President of the United States James Dale (Jack Nicholson) announces Martians have been spotted circling Earth. The Martians land and a meeting is arranged, but not everything goes to plan, and the Martians seem to have other plans for Earth. Are they just misunderstood beings or do they really want to destroy all of humanity?

movies.title: Dishonored
movies.summary: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.
movies.description_full: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.
movies.synopsis: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.

movies.title: Her Blue Sky
movies.summary: Second-year high school student Aoi Aioi is an aspiring musician Aoi Aioi. Her older sister Akane's ex-boyfriend Shinnosuke Kanomura is a struggling guitarist. Aoi and Akane's parents passed away in an accident 13 years ago, and Akane gave up her ambition of going to Tokyo with Shinnosuke to take care of Aoi. Since then, Aoi has felt indebted to her older sister. One day, she is invited to perform at a music festival as a session musician by a famous en singer named Dankichi. At the same time, Shinnosuke returns to Aoi and Akane's town after a long time away. Then, Shinno mysteriously appears- who is actually Shinnosuke from 13 years ago after traveling from the past to the present-and Aoi falls in love for the first time.
